About this sample.Sample: Fan-shaped body of a 5 day-old adult male drosophila (Genome type: iso Canton S G1 x w1118 iso 5905).
About this sample.Protocol: Chemical Fixation, ORTO-Lead-EPTA staining via progressive lowering of temperature and low temperature staining (PLT-LTS) heavy metal enhancement protocol.
About this sample.Contributions: Sample provided by Zhiyuan Lu (HHMI/Janelia), prepared, imaged and post-processed by Song Pang (HHMI/Janelia), with post-processing by C. Shan Xu (HHMI/Janelia).
